targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "samples" WHERE ("type" = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "responsecode" fill(none)

panels.title: Response time of all transactions in $Scenario (ms)
Transactions with highest response time in $Scenario (ms)
Response time of all requests in $Scenario | $Transaction (ms)
Requests with highest response time in $Transaction (ms)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "loadscriptname"
list.name: Scenario
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "loadscriptname"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "transactionname" WHERE "loadscriptname" =~ /^$Scenario$/
list.name: Transaction
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "transactionname" WHERE "loadscriptname" =~ /^$Scenario$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "label" WHERE "loadscriptname" =~ /^$Scenario$/ AND "transactionname" =~ /^$Transaction$/
list.name: Request
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "label" WHERE "loadscriptname" =~ /^$Scenario$/ AND "transactionname" =~ /^$Transaction$/
